Metadata.Title: Exposure of Resource to Wrong Sphere
Metadata.DirectLink: Exposure of Resource to Wrong Sphere

Content.Data:
==Description==
The product exposes a resource to the wrong control sphere, providing unintended actors with inappropriate access to the resource.
==Impact==
==Countermeasures==
==Checklists==
==Additional Resources==
